name: Dice the Goblin
description:
Pick dice, roll at goblins. 

Kill goblins, save yourself!

Controls:

  • Click LMB  to grab a dice
  • Click again to drop
  • Hold & Release to roll

Shop:

  • Drop the dice into the pouch to earn some money
  • LMB to buy a dice
  • More times bought: higher chance of spawning

Credits: Kuorell (programming, game design), Levigos (programming),  Shunyah (Visuals).

Music used: YouTube
